WorkItem.Summary: Crash when setting class to Warrior

Comments.Message: Err, there should be alot more to the exception than that... Does it happen again?

That's the entire thing (obviously without the loaded assemblies).  It happens every time I load any type of Warrior, from a character file or the Armory, or even just setting the model to Warrior.

Going to replicate the entire directory, could just be a borked portion of the physical disk.

From the quick Googling I'm seeing, there's an exception occuring in a dll that's being loaded into the main program that isn't being handled, but since I can't reproduce in Rawr2, maybe you do have a bad copy.

HOWEVER, while not seeing this exact issue, I can't get Rawr3 to work for DPSWarr, switching to the module instantly crashes. I'm talking to Astrylian about it since I can't debug it.
Prot works for me atleast. But DPS crashes. RAWR 2.2.17
Crashes how? With the same error above or what? Please post an xml and an error log (IN A FILE, DO NOT WALL OF TEXT A POST)
This issue is resolved, it was indeed a bad portion of disk, and no longer occurs (issue of my own machine, not of the program code).  Mintrol, please start a new item for your issue.
